compliant.section: We will in no event sell, change, and/or rent your personal information.
compliant.legal provisions: Data Minimisation, Purpose Limitation, Lawfulness, Fairness, and Transparency

compliant.section: We will only share your personal information outside our Company with your consent in advance, as required by law.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of Processing, Conditions for Consent

non_compliant.section: Our website has security measure to protect your personal information and the website, such as firewalls and anti-virus systems.
non_compliant.amend: This statement is too general.  The GDPR requires controllers to implement "appropriate technical and organisational measures" to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk.  The policy should specify the measures in place beyond firewalls and anti-virus software, or at least state that it takes a risk-based approach to data security.

non_compliant.section: Our Company is not responsible for any third party site is linked to our website or other website of our Company, including without limit Privacy Policy.
non_compliant.amend: The GDPR has a broad scope and may apply to third-party websites depending on the nature of the link and the data processing activities. The company cannot simply disclaim responsibility for third-party sites. It should instead provide clear and specific information about its data processing activities in relation to third-party sites, including the legal basis for any data transfers and the safeguards in place to protect personal data.
